name: Tex Murphy: The Pandora Directive
description: It's April 2043 and you- as Tex Murphy, the last of the old-style gumshoes- find yourself racing against time in the most dangerous game of your life. What is the truth behind the rumored UFO crash at Roswell, New Mexico? Why did the military suddenly shut down and seal off the Roswell complex?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 Processor: 1.0 GHz Processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 100% DirectX compatible graphics Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: 100% DirectX compatible card or onboard sound
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1.5 GHz Processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 100% DirectX compatible graphics Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: 100% DirectX compatible card or onboard sound

reviews.review_text: The graphics are so ridiculous... BUT, this doesn't matter!!! It's a splendid game. It is difficult, it is intrigant, it is funny, it is a challenge for your mind. And the protagonist, Tex, he's a joke. hahahahahahaha
